alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued September 24 at 4:00PM ChST until September 25 at 1:00AM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY THROUGH SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Guam, Rota, Saipan and Tinian. * WHEN...Sunday and Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Low-water crossings may be flooded. Storm drains and ditches may become clogged with debris. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Locally heavy showers associated with a tropical disturbance may produce flash floods, especially in hilly terrain. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
